data.text: @bry_guy_03 Hi Bryan, you can send us your inquiry in a DM. We'll be happy to assist you further. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@daniwigbels Hi Dani, schicke uns bitte deine Buchungscode oder Name und Flugdaten per PM und wir schauen dir gerne nach. https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@VlissaraU Hi, I have already replied to your PM. Kind regards

@BarelyAcademic Hi Arian, due to the sheer amount of requests at the moment, we are unable to predict you with a time frame, unfortunately. I am very sorry for any inconvenience this has caused. Kind regards, Derya
@alterengo Hi Anton, please reply to the last email you have received from our colleagues. They will check it for you. Kind regards, Derya
@si_leach Hi, this is something that needs to be looked at by our special cases department. Please contact them per email as my colleague said. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@TNanzer Hi Tonya, I have already replied to your other message. Kind regards, Derya
@Kate_Lorimer Hi Kate, thanks for the postive feedback. We hope you have a great  holiday. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@patzistar Hi Patrick, bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode in einer DM. Liebe Grüße, Christine
@si_leach Hi, please mind that we are not able to assist you in this case. Further information will be given by our colleagues specialcases@austrian.com. Kind regards, Christine
@Jeannet70584147 @TinNguyen15 [2/2] 100% for hygienic articles and 50% for clothes that were bought in the meantime, will be indemnified. Please keep all receipts. Kind regards, Christine

data.text: @romasars @Erasergirl1 Hi Roma, we want you to know that we can completely understand your anger but we cannot offer an immediate solution in this case. You can also track your baggage here https://t.co/lYCQG0KpXK. Kind regards, Christine

@romasars Hi,I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered.Please turn to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report–you’ve received the Passenger Irregularity Report at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case.Christine

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @KippAnna Hi Anna, we are sorry to hear that our service did not meet your expectations. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/iSWK3YnzlN  Kind regards, Chris

@realrickmott Hi Rick, we regret to read that you are not able to reach us. In case the seats are chargeable, only our call center colleagues are authorized to take payment details from you. We can only advise you to try it again later. Kind regards, Christine

@TinNguyen15 Hi Tin, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@B_Encounter (2/2) to your e-mail, until then we have to kindly ask you for your continued patience. Thank you.
Kind regards, Alessandra

@B_Encounter (1/2) Hello,
as this is the specialized field of our colleagues in the feedback department we kindly ask to you stay in contact with them regarding this matter. We understand that the waiting time can be longer as usual but our colleagues will reply as soon as possible
@ayeshashim Hi Ayesha, I'm really sorry that you couldn't take your flight as planned. Please send us your booking code via DM, so we can take a closer look into your case. Kind regards, Daphne
@makyjen [1] Hi Jen, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@makyjen [2] Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues for any potential queries or revision requests. 
Best regards, Shawn
@thedierk Hi Michelle, please send us your booking code via DM. We'll be glad to help you 😊 Kind regards, Daphne

@emusiclady Dear Kim,
we're sorry you are not satisfied with the reply. 
Please turn to the contact person from the e-mail contact. We - as the Social Media team cannot assist you further. We kindly ask for your understanding.
Kind regards, 
Alessandra

urls.title: Delayed or damaged baggage
urls.description: Did your case not arrive or did it arrive damaged? No worries, we will take care of this. Read important information about this eventuality.

data.text: @daphne993 Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Please use this link https://t.co/dk68Vpvkkp to submit your refund request. If you are still facing difficulties please use a different browser and empty your cache. Kind regards, Derya
@jljousma [2/2] Our colleagues will have a closer look at your case and will come back to you as soon as possible. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @jljousma [1/2]Hi there, we regret to hear that your baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. In order to submit a claim please use the following link https://t.co/fdNkMAqnId. https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS
@RhysDowsett Hi Anthony, please find further information via the following link: https://t.co/iATMVIuA0S Kind regards, Chris
@Ja_Le_C @Davethesoviet Hi there, please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly take a closer look into it. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@mflapdoodle Hi there, we are sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us your booking code via PM, so we can assist you further.
Best regards, Shawn

@clarissimata (1/2) Hello there,
I have just checked your booking.
The rebooking will be EUR 70.,--.if the same booking class on this date is available.
In case of a closed booking class, you will have to pay the difference between the fare classes as well.

@clarissimata (2/2) Please note that the payment for the upgrade is not refundable and cannot be transferred to the rebooked flight.
Best regards, Alessandra

@cwales95 @MartinSLewis Hi Cameron, we are really sorry for the long wait. Due to the current situation, unfortunately, all our channels are overloaded and there may be longer waiting times. I kindly ask you for patience. Best regards, Shawn

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @jvallstrand Hi Johan, you can also contact us via the respective web form: https://t.co/XDgRxAD6Iv or by sending us your inquiry in a DM. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6SOY0
@Wendytan_uk [2] Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues for any potential queries or revision requests. Once again we do apologize for the inconvenience. Best regards Shawn

I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@cwales95 @MartinSLewis Hi Cameron, sorry to hear about the long wait. Have you submitted your request via our homepage? If not, please proceed via the follwoing link https://t.co/1jYyfcuAde - My colleagues will try their best to assist you further.
Best regards, Shawn

Going once, going twice, aaaaaaaaaand: SOLD! 💯💺✈️Austrian Airlines auctioned no longer required Economy Class plane seats, as well as more than 170 flight trolleys.🌎 With this charity auction, we collected almost 60.000 Euros for NGO Nachbar in Not.🙏 https://t.co/7jrQBiIZBi
@hero1a Hi, bezüglich des Sitzgurtes gibt dir unsere Crew an Bord gerne Hilfestellung. Liebe Grüße, Christine
@oppositeofleft3 Hi Jacob, please contact the respective authorities to get the needed information. I am sorry that we cannot assist you in this matter. Kind regards, Christine

@oppositeofleft3 Hi Jacob, you do not need a test for your stay on board. If your end destination requires a test, you will be asked to show your test result before boarding. Regarding the current entry regulations kindly contact the respective authorities directly. Best regards, Christiane

@ThegomerReport Hi there, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can have a closer look at it or contact your travel agency directly for further information. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@t0nydelgado Hi,unfortunately the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please turn to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR. The contact person there will be glad to assist you.
Kind regards, Christine
@Overhurled Hi Jen, yes you can always check in at the airport.
@Han0o0sh7 Hi, please mind that the minimum connecting time for Vienna airport is only 25 minutes. Kind regards, Christine
@corentingi Hi Corentin, I'm sorry that you're having trouble filling out the form. Please write us here: impressum@austrian.com. Kind regards, Daphne

data.text: @corentingi Hi Corentin, have you tried another browser already? Kind regards, Daphne

@bianca44107994 Liebe Bianca, wir versuchen unser bestmögliches um Flugunregelmäßigkeiten zu vermeiden. Sei versichert, dass wir keine Flüge, ohne jeglichen Grund verspäten. Ich hoffe, dass du trotzdem gut an dein Ziel angekommen bist. 😊 Liebe Grüße, Daphne
@spcnvdrr Hi there! Glad that everything went well 😊 Have a nice day! Kind regards, Daphne

data.text: @Capitain_Kirk_ Hi, gerne kannst du auch unser Service Center https://t.co/Wudu4KtQrN für eine Buchung kontaktieren. Liebe Grüße, Christine
@oreleon Hi John, please check the monitors at the airport directly regarding your departure gate and time. Kind regards, Chris

@khanisafwan Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @cochinperri Hi Perri, we will partly reimburse you for expenses you had due to the baggage delay. In accordance with regulations, we will cover 50% of expenses for clothes and 100% for cosmetic products. Please send your request via this form https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 Kind regards
@radwa_magdysamy Hi Radwa, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris
@ssjk28071985 Hi there, please be informed that our flight OS710 today has been delayed due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft. Kind regards, Chris
@sh1nkuno Hi there, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

@michaeljay1210 @British_Airways Hi Michael, please send us your booking code in a DM. We actually don´t operate flights to and from London Gatwick. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

data.text: @Aly_Dar8 Hi there, we are very sorry to hear that you were affected by overbooking and couldn´t board the plane. Please send your claim via https://t.co/1IJxVj7Mv4. Our colleagues will have a look at your case and inform you accordingly. I´m sorry for the inconvenience caused. Derya
@alterengo Hi Anton, we regret to read that you didn't receive any answer yet. Please send us your booking code and reference number from the e-mail in a DM. Kind regards, Christine

urls.title: Contact request on other topics
urls.description: Do you have a question that is not answered on the Austrian Airlines website? Get in touch and we will be happy to help.

data.text: @bprainsack Hi Barbara, I am sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again. Of course, we also want to take the time that each passenger needs. You can also send your inquiry via the respective web form https://t.co/TV259uaPBq Best regards, Christiane

@pp12 Hi, I'm sorry luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to luggage claims. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. Kind regards, Lyndsay
